titleStmt.title: A brief treatise conteyning some grounds and reasons, against two errours of the Anabaptists 1. The one, concerning baptisme of infants. 2. The other, concerning anabaptisme of elder people. By Francis Iohnson, pastor of the exiled English Church at Amsterdam.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Francis, 1562-1618.
